articles.author: Kyle Orland
articles.title: Why a bump to $700 could be a "death sentence" for the Steam Machine - Ars Technica
articles.description: Analysts expect Valve might be hit particularly hard by soaring RAM, storage prices.

articles.author: Russell Brandom
articles.title: Elon Musk is getting serious about orbital data centers - TechCrunch
articles.description: We’re starting to see the idea of Musk-owned orbital AI data clusters cohere into an actual plan.
articles.content: On Friday, when SpaceX filed plans with the Federal Communications Commission (FCC) for a million-satellite data center network, you might have thought Elon Musk was having a bit of fun with us. But … [+3253 chars]
